HERO.TEXT1: Simply with us, move everything: furniture, goods, cars, people... and more with
HERO.TEXT2: Whether your items are few or many, small or large, a delivery will take them to a nearby or far location without hassle.

ABOUT.TITLE: TWSILA is a Saudi Application
ABOUT.DESC: Targeting The Global Market Specialized In Transporting People, Goods, Furniture, Cars, Water,…….and_more.

PRICING.DESC: We offer a 100% negotiable price between the passenger and the captain. With no app trace, get the most out of all reports.

CAREER.SLOGAN: Grow with Us, Succeed with Us!

CONTRACTRELATION.TITLE: Contractual Relationship
CONTRACTRELATION.DESC: These Terms of Use govern the access or use by individuals in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia of the applications, websites, content and services provided by the Abdul Rahman bin Nasser bin Abdullah Al-Shaqawi Information Systems Technology Foundation (Tawseela Application), a sole proprietorship established in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and headquartered in Al-Ahsa.

TERMSOFUSE.TITLE: Terms of Use
TERMSOFUSE.DESC: By using the Tawseela Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms, which establish a contractual relationship between you and Tawseela. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the Services. These Terms specifically replace any prior agreements or arrangements with you. Tawseela may terminate these Terms or any of the Services to which you are entitled immediately or generally stop offering or deny access to the Services or any part thereof at any time for any reason.

BASICSERVICES.TITLE: Basic Services
BASICSERVICES.DESC: The Services constitute a mobile application that enables users of the mobile applications provided as part of the Services (each, an 'Application') to arrange and schedule transportation and/or logistics services with independent third-party providers of such services, including independent third-party transportation providers and independent third-party logistics providers under an agreement with Tawsilah (the 'Third-Party Providers'). All transportation or logistics services are provided by independent third-party providers who are not employed by Tawsilah or any of its affiliates.

LAWAPPLICABLE.TITLE: The law applicable to the arbitration proceedings.
LAWAPPLICABLE.DESC: Except as otherwise provided in these Terms, these Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia alone, excluding its rules relating to conflicts of laws, and the language of mediation shall be Arabic.

OTHERPROV.HEAD: Other Provisions
OTHERPROV.DESCNOTIFY: Tawsila may provide notices by sending a general notice regarding the Services, by email to your registered email address, by text message or notification through the Application Platform, or by sending a written letter by regular mail to your registered address. You may also provide notices to Tawsila by written correspondence to an address the Company deems appropriate.
OTHERPROV.DESCPOLICY: We collect information that helps us determine your location, including GPS information, Internet Protocol (IP) address, and Wi-Fi network. There are many ways location information helps create a seamless and hassle-free experience. Pricing is determined based on an agreement between the service requester and the captain without any intervention from the app. Your location is used to facilitate driver pickup and drop-off, provide ride status, history, and billing, facilitate research and development, schedule trips, create trips by the captain, enable social features, enhance the safety and security of our users' accounts, and combat and detect fraud.
